about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled mission to reclaim an overrun facility teeming with escaped monsters! With a less-than-stellar employer, you'll need to scavenge and repurpose gear to ensure your survival. Uncover hidden secrets and piece together the chilling tale of what befell this once-thriving locale. Are you ready to dive into the heart of the unknown?

Enter a realm of chaos where various monstrous entities have broken free from their confines! Equipped with the ability to purchase the necessary tools from your employer, you're tasked with capturing these malevolent beings. But tread carefully, for these creatures are not to be underestimated—they're as fierce as they come. Are you prepared to face the ultimate challenge and restore order to the realm?

Beware the treacherous Generator—it's no ally of yours! Keep its gears greased with ample bribes, or risk facing the wrath of malfunctioning doors, flickering lights, and other mechanical mishaps. In this high-stakes game of survival, every coin counts as you navigate the perilous labyrinth of the facility. Choose wisely, or face the consequences of a dark and unforgiving fate.

Scour the depths of the overrun facility, gathering valuable items to sell and acquire crucial gear for your survival. With limited resources at your disposal, every decision counts. Will you opt for cunning traps, formidable weapons, vital support gear, or life-saving healing items?

Your sole objective: survival. Amidst the chaos and terror of the overrun facility, your mission is clear. Every move you make, every decision you take, must be geared toward one ultimate goal: staying alive. Do you have what it takes to outlast the horrors that lurk in the shadows? The challenge awaits, and your determination will be put to the ultimate test.

name: Dark Dive
short_description: You're a "willing" employee, that got send down into the lower levels to capture the escaped monsters. Proceed through the random generated levels, gather items and find the monster. Good luck surviving!
